message.content:
1. The patients in the study are aged 10-17 years.
2. The patients have an acute episode of bipolar depression.
3. The patients and their parents reported improvements when treated with OFC.
4. Parents noticed improvements in more areas than their offspring did.
5. The improvements were in some aspects of Quality of Life (QoL).
6. The treatment with OFC was compared with a placebo.
7. The improvements were greater with OFC treatment than with placebo.

messages.content:
Statement: Patients aged 10–17 years with an acute episode of bipolar depression and their parents reported greater improvements (parents noticed improvements in more areas than did their offspring) on some aspects of QoL when treated with OFC compared with placebo.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
